TITLE: Configure Notifications - FastComments
HEADING: Notifications Settings
REPLY_NOTIFICATIONS_HELP_TENANT: Includes notifications about new comments, as well as replies to your own. We'll also send notifications when you're tagged. You can control how often you receive these per subscription below.
REPLY_NOTIFICATIONS_HELP_USER: Notifications when you're tagged or replied to.
ENABLE_NOTIFICATIONS_HELP: This includes admin-only notifications, like notifications about new comments, and notices regarding your account.
DIGEST_DESCRIPTION: We can send you a reminder for comments you may have to review or approve on a regular schedule, as well as counts for:
DIGEST_SCHEDULE_HELP: We'll send you a summary email on this schedule.
LANGUAGE_HELP: The language that emails should be translated in.
SUBSCRIPTIONS_DESCRIPTION: Here you can manage your page subscriptions. To be notified of new comments on a page, click the bell on a comment widget and click "Subscribe".
NO_SUBSCRIPTIONS: You don't have any subscriptions yet.
